comments:
1. in build EPF061020-1951 and use CCRC 7.0.1
2. create a plugin with content package (with some elements) and a CP/a config 
3. export the config
4. delete the plugin
5. reimport the config
6. the following problems shows when import finished,

a. the CP becomes unresolved
b. all elements in the plugin are view-private, and not prompt to add to source control
c. errors in .log

this problem only happens when delete the plugin before import the config.

To reproduce the problem use the export file in \\jinhua\shares\long\164025
This can be reproduced with the full client ClearCase too.

This is not kind of a normal case, and it is not a regression. The cause has been identified: when importing a new plugin that has a cp with default config in the base, that config is not checked for modified status.
Fixed in LibraryImportManager. The fix has only been checked into the head branch.
The fix is verified in build 1.0.1.1-N20061112-1708
